title: How To Ride In The Dark - Top Tips For Cycling At Night

media:group.media:title: How To Ride In The Dark - Top Tips For Cycling At Night
media:group.media:description:
As days get shorter and nights get longer, riding in the dark becomes more of a necessity than an option. It can be daunting or even dangerous, but with the correct set-up you can make cycling at night safe and enjoyable. Here are Conor & Manon‚Äôs top tips‚Ä¶

0:00 Intro
0:35 Clear lens glasses
1:16 Switch lights on early
1:57 Light setup
3:37 Always have a backup
3:59 Temperature
4:34 Visibility
5:01 Buddy up, know your route
5:58 Take things a little slower
6:42 City riding
